articles.title: Russia warns of nuclear, hypersonic deployment if Sweden and Finland join Nato - TimesLIVE
articles.description: One of Russian President Vladimir Putin's closest allies warned Nato on Thursday that if Sweden and Finland joined the US-led military alliance then Russia would deploy nuclear weapons and hypersonic missiles in an exclave in the heart of Europe.
